title: Waterfall
description: To perform a waterfall, each player starts drinking their beverage at the same time as the person to their left. No player can stop drinking until the player before them stops.

title: 2 for you
description: You point at two persons and tell them to drink. You can also tell one person to take two drinks.

title: Hit the floor
description: Last person to touch the floor with their hands must take a drink.
